title: Road & Track and the Mustang Mach-E
description:
Travis Okulski, Kyle Kinard, and Mack Hogan in studio representing Road & Track! We'll get the 'editor's defense' of the Veloster N as PCOTY, talk Mustang Mach-E, and about APEX: The Secret Race Across America!

https://www.roadandtrack.com

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/v6xfWgqLdeI

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @tokulski @kjkinard @macklinhogan

 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
